page.title: 01EXMOOR
page.content:
At first sight our survey area looks as if it contains a wide variety of land use, but on closer examination it revealed a predominance of rough grazing and moorland.
The south and north of the area is mainly composed of moorland, but there is a central strip running east to west which is mainly farmland.
The village of Simonsbath lies in the central strip and close to the village is to be found the most intensive land use,woodland and orchards.The fields appear to be smaller, the closer you get to Simonsbath.
